name: Marave Happy Hour
description:
Time to marave ! You play Bicrave Marave, a kind soul wanting to help the others. The problem is that he's too strong. Way too strong. Discover how he helps the others through 3 stages with multiples interactions.  Watch out you may encounter some internal conflicts between Bicrave and his brain! Made during the #ENJAM2020 - Theme was "Wait, are we the bad guys?" Controls:

WASD or ZQSD: Move
Spacebar: Interact

Challenges completed :

Challenge “ENJMIN ExtendedUniverse”: Share the same world building between different projects ! ✅
Done with "Boris Attac Boris Protecc" !

Visual Challenge “Wissam” : Use yellow as a major tint ✅
Just check our magnificent background !


Marketing Challenge “Shitpost” : Tease your game once a working hour on the social media ✅
Oh boy, be ready for the spiciest account out there: https://twitter.com/BicraveM (French only sorry !)


Programming Challenge “Power Mode” : Use a power mode extension on your code editor ❌
We did not ! But our game is so freaking juicy that its power is even beyond the code!


Audio Challenge “Shrek is love, Shrek is life: ”Resample only sounds from the Shrek movies." ❌ (Maybe)
His power was too great for us to sample.

Credits : 
  • Game Art : Louis & Rémi
  • Programming :  Cyril , Victor & Simon
  • Game Design : Alexandre
  • Audio : Laurent
  • Shitpost on Twitter : Bicrave Marave
